channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0928; 01:59PM; 250 W 81st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48ziqiN; #Florence; The total number of vehicles involved in the collision has been updated to *3 vehicles* involved. A total of 7 patients transported to area hospitals. Three patients in critical condition (40M, 36F, and 28M) and four patients in fair condition (24F, 5F, 4F, and 5-month-old female). Nothing further.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E209 E21 E266 E57 EM1 EM18 EM4 RA209 RA21 RA246 RA43 RA810 RA811 RA813 RA857 RA864 RA866 T66; CH4; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Now Stopped; INC#0969; 01:32PM; 11452 W Sheldon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LKYuPS; #ShadowHills; Approximately 1/2-acre of light/medium brush in the Hansen Dam area. Crews are initiating a fire attack by ground and air. It took 47 firefighters 20 minutes surround the final one-acre burn footprint, stopping all forward progress. Crews will remain on scene to improve containment lines and cool all hot spots within the one-acre burn area ("mop up" operations). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E24 E274 E289 E290 E298 E77 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM14 FR91 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA90 T74 T89 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0928; 01:11PM; 250 W 81st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48ziqiN; #Florence; A four-vehicle traffic collision (with no entrapment) resulted in *at least* six patients requiring transport, including the following genders/approximate ages: 36F, 24F, 40M, 28M, 5F, and 4F (and possibly a seventh patient, who is being evaluated on scene). Unknown medical conditions. LAPD Inc #2343.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E209 E21 E266 E57 EM1 EM18 EM4 RA209 RA21 RA246 RA43 RA810 RA811 RA813 RA857 RA864 RA866 T66; CH4; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0180; 04:06AM; 905 S Ardmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rF0XEY; #Koreatown; It took 45 firefighters 17 minutes to extinguish the flames inside the boarded-up two-story home, however two patients resulted from the fire. One approximately 21-year-old male had minor injuries from jumping out of the house from the second floor (fair condition), and an approximately 50-year-old female sustained burns and smoke inhalation (critical condition). Both patients were transported. The cause of the fire remains under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E211 E226 E229 E26 E29 EM1 EM11 RA11 RA29 RA52 RA813 SQ21 T11 T26 T29; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0167; 03:54AM; 6739 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZI1uT5; #ValleyGlen; Forty firefighters responded to the two-story apartment building, engaging in an offensive operation, coordinating fire attack and vertical ventilation, to extinguish the flames in 21 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E39 E60 EM14 RA102 RA39 RA889 SO1 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0180; 03:49AM; 3254 James M Wood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/46iZJhM; #Koreatown; Two-story single-family home with fire showing from the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E11 E211 E229 E26 E29 RA29 RA813 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0167; 03:33AM; 6739 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZI1uT5; #ValleyGlen; Two-story apartment building with fire in one unit. Offensive mode. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E39 E60 EM14 RA102 RA39 RA889 SO1 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0914; 01:47PM; 1503 W 47th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LMOyp0; Vermont#Square; It took 30 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in the rear of the home and the attic. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. LAPD Inc #2555.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E34 E66 RA266 RA815 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0914; 01:30PM; 1503 W 47th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LMOyp0; #VermontSquare; Fire showing from the rear of a one-story single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E34 E66 RA266 RA815 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Fatality Vehicle Fire; INC#1656; 09:05PM; 11800 W Strathern St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ROkm0V; #SunValley; Firefighters arrived quickly to the scene to discover an RV with heavy fire showing. During fire extinguishment, a lifeless body was discovered in the vehicle. Beyond medical help, the victim was determined deceased and remains at the scene. One adult female fled the burning RV and is in the care of Firefighter/Paramedics being treated for burns and smoke inhalation. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD Inc #4068 and Medical Examiner.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E289 E89 RA102 RA89 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
